coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that this piercing was made by 'Norin'.
coreAttributes.name: vertical hood piercing
coreAttributes.description: A metal vertical hood piercing with a gem on each end.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slide a vertical hood piercing out from your [pc.clit].
displacementText.playerNPC: You slide a vertical hood piercing out from [npc.name]'s [npc.clit].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You give [npc.name]'s vertical hood piercing a tug before sliding it out.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing out from [npc.herHis] [npc.clit].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing out from your [pc.clit].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] gives your vertical hood piercing a tug before sliding it out.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing out from [npc2.name]'s [npc2.clit].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] gives [npc2.name]'s vertical hood piercing a tug before sliding it out.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide a vertical hood piercing into your [pc.clit].
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide a vertical hood piercing into [npc.name]'s [npc.clit].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You pinch [npc.name]'s [npc.clit] before sliding a vertical hood piercing into place.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing into [npc.herHis] [npc.clit].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing into your [pc.clit].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pinches your [pc.clit] before sliding a vertical hood piercing into place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides a vertical hood piercing into [npc2.Name]'s [npc2.clit].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] pinches [npc2.Name]'s [npc2.clit] before sliding a vertical hood piercing into place.
